InfiMeet
Home Guidelines Features Dashboard

Meet new and interesting People to build the network

  • Sharpen your knowledge
  • Team building
  • Break out of your comfort zone
  • Re-energise
  • Gain and share new ideas and best practices

User friendly

High priority is given for the people with less knowledge on tech.So easy to use, even a person with little to no knowledge on Tech can access the features

Guaranteed to work

Highly focused on building a strong network among the people and let them leran new and interesting stuff

Very Specific

Highly specific towards a community of people with common interests

Dashboard

The very first step a participant has to do inorder to attend an event is to go to the dashboard which shows all types of sessions under each session one can find the specific events.

Registration

Once a participant enters the dashboard,one can see all the events listed under each category. You have to register for the specific event that you are looking for.

Attend The Event

Participants can attend event only once he/she completes the registration through google authenticaton.Click on attend event button, it would let you see all the events taht you registered.

This Feature will let host to organize a conference which requires the authentication of the host's google account.Host is bound to choose a particular type of session mentioned in the dashboard.Once the host creates a session it gets updated in the dashboard and lets participants to view them.

Host

Dashboard primarily consists of four kinds of sessions which include keynote sessions, paper presentation, poster presentation and invite talks.Among them invite talks will let the host share the session details in person. if the recipient accepts the invitation, corresponding session gets added into the registered sessions.

Dashboard

This feature will let the participants view or enter into the events which were already registered by the participant.All the four type of sessions can be entered only with the help of this feature, After the corresponding session starts and before it ends.

Attend an Event

Inorder to attend any event the participant must register for the corresponding session without which is not possible to enter any session.Once a participant registers for a session, the session gets added into the participant's list of events, then the person will be able to access the session.

Registration
